mapper.insert: insert into springboard(seq, title, writer, content) values((select nvl(max(seq), 0)+1 from springboard),#{title},#{writer},#{content})
mapper.update: update springboard set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where seq =#{seq}
mapper.select: select * from springboard where title like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by seq desc
select * from springboard where content like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by seq desc
